item.title: TLS/SSL (Transport Encryption)
item.description: New to KubeDB? Please start here. This is an Enterprise-only feature. Please install KubeDB Enterprise Edition to try this feature. Configure TLS/SSL in MariaDB KubeDB supports providing TLS/SSL encryption (via, requireSSL mode) for MariaDB. This tutorial will show you how to use KubeDB to deploy a MariaDB database with TLS/SSL configuration. Before You Begin At first, you need to have a Kubernetes cluster, and the kubectl command-line tool must be configured to communicate with your cluster.
